snippet.title: The Crimson Diamond Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's a brief gameplay trailer for The Crimson Diamond! TCD is a text-parser EGA mystery adventure game by indie game developer Julia Minamata. FREE demo available on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1098770/The_Crimson_Diamond/

To download the demo direct from me, subscribe to the mailing list, and grab social media links, visit: www.thecrimsondiamond.com.

The Crimson Diamond is inspired by classic adventure games of the late 80s and early 90s, particularly Sierra On-line's The Colonel's Bequest. Explore Crimson Lodge and its environs! Eavesdrop on intriguing characters! Solve mysteries!

This game is being made in Adventure Game Studio.
